1.text: Increases stats gained from friendship training

2.text: Increases motivation stat bonus when training together

3.text: Increases the amount of speed gain when training together

5.text: Increases the amount of power gain when training together

6.text: Increases the amount of guts gain when training together

7.text: Increases the amount of wisdom gain when training together

8.text: Increases stat gains when training together

11.text: Initial power at the start of training is increased

12.text: Initial guts at the start of training is increased

15.text: Increases stat and skill point gains after finishing a race

16.text: Increases fan count increase after finishing a race

17.text: Increases hint level from events of this card

19.text: Increases probability of getting assigned to specialty training category

20.text: Increases upper limit of speed at the start of the training

22.text: Increases upper limit of power at the start of the training

23.text: Increases upper limit of guts at the start of the training

25.text: Increases energy recovered from this card's events

26.text: Increases effects from this card's events
